headline: CRL Q1 Earnings Call: Regulatory Changes and Market Stabilization Shape Outlook
summary: Lab services company Charles River Laboratories (NYSE:CRL) reported Q1 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, but sales fell by 2.7% year on year to $984.2 million. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.34 per share was 12.8% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
